edu.istic.tdf.dfclient.dao

Interface IDao<E extends Entity,R extends IRepository<E>,C extends IRestClient<E>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - Entity to manage
    R - Repository of this entity
    C - Rest Client of this entity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dao, DroneDao, ElementDao, InterventionDao, InterventionMeanDao, PointOfInterestDao, SinisterDao

    public interface IDao<E extends Entity,R extends IRepository<E>,C extends IRestClient<E>>
    A base DAO for all domain Entities
